questions.question_text: In which Cisco SD-WAN deployment scenario does Cisco Umbrella SIG deliver the most value?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
SD-WAN routers can integrate with Secure Internet Gateways (SIG) which do the majority of the processing to secure enterprise traffic.

When the SIG is set up, all client traffic, based on routes or policy, is forwarded to the SIG.

Selected Answer: B
for me is B

choices.D: when a centralized Internet breakout solution is implemented
choices.C: when the identity of several WAN Edge devices is verified throughout the network
choices.A: when Cisco IOS XE SD-WAN devices are deployed throughout the network
choices.B: when resource-intensive security operations are offloaded from entry-level WAN Edge devices

questions.question_text: Which VPN must be present on at least one interface to install Cisco vManage and integrate it with WAN Edge devices in an overlay network site ID:S0123T4E56F78?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
VPN0 is the transport VPN

questions.question_text: A network administrator configures SNMPv3 on a Cisco WAN Edge router from CLI for monitoring purposes. How many characters are supported by the snmp user command?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
User Name â€” Enter the name that identifies the SNMPv3 user. User names can contain up to 32 alphanumeric characters.

questions.question_text: Which two actions are necessary to set the Controller Certificate Authorization mode to indicate a root certificate? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Upload an SSL certificate to vManage.
choices.B: Change the organization name of the Cisco SD-WAN fabric.
choices.E: Select a validity period from the drop-down menu.
choices.A: Select a private certificate signing authority instead of a public certificate signing authority.
choices.C: Select the Controller Certificate Authorization mode that is recommended by Cisco.
